message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you reaching out. I'm interested, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be open to $85?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $90 and $85. How about $87.50? It's a great price for a fantastic product, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
